title: Why cant I change the size of the new client?
body: I reinstalled Windows 7 and updated every single driver in existence. I find that I can no longer click and drag to expand the client size, the only available resolution in the client app is 1024 x 576 for some reason as well. Any suggestions?

replies.body: You can still rescale the client!  Using your keyboard, Hold CTRL and use the plus (+) and minus (-) keys to scale it up or down.  I hope that helps!
I tried using the command you mentioned but it still does not scale :( I tried CTRL +/- on both the numpad and the number row.

That's really strange!  In that case, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help as well.  Let them know what keyboard you're using, and if you have any screenshots of how the client looks for you in the ticket.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
